title: Lezyne Gravel Floor Pumps get tubeless-specific chuck to seat mid-volume tires
content:
We’ve got high pressure, low volume pumps for road bikes. Then there’s low pressure, high volume pumps for mountain and fat bikes. That leaves room for pumps for gravel bikes, right? Well, notÂ just gravel. Lezyne’s new floor pumps are built to make inflating gravel tires easier, while still able to hit the high notes for […]

The post Lezyne Gravel Floor Pumps get tubeless-specific chuck to seat mid-volume tires appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
